headline: Is Gartner (IT) Ready if Enterprise AI Tools Cannibalize Its Core Advisory Revenue Model?
summary: Gartner, Inc.’s Data & Analytics Summit 2026 took place in Sydney from 16–17 January, as the firm highlighted trends in enterprise AI spending and organizational readiness for adoption. At the same time, investors are weighing Gartner’s forecasts for very large global AI investment against slowing contract renewals, margin pressure, and concerns that AI tools could erode demand for its traditional advisory services. Next, we’ll examine how concerns over slowing contract renewals and margin...
